original: Saraṇaṁ hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇam hīnam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na hīnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam majjhimam dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na majjhimaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam majjhimam dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ na majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Araṇaṁ paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam paṇītam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na paṇītaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
